title: Il Cristo Proibito.1951.DVDRip.x264
description:
After World War II, the former POW Bruno Baldi returns to his village in Toscana with the intention of revenging his brother, Giulio, betrayed by a villager and shot by a German firing squad. However neither his parents nor his friends reveal the name of the culprit to avoid another bloodbath in their village. During a religious party, Bruno's best friend, Antonio, discloses that he killed a man twenty years ago in America and has had trouble coming to terms with his actions. He also reveals another dark secret.
